title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water according to the package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix in the cheeses.
Drain the pasta and mix with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Cook the tomato puree and cream in a pan, and add the grilled chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice.
